channel.title: Cliff helicopter fight crashes my game completely
channel.description: Hello, I'm really enjoying this mod but faced a gamebreaking bug (for me) that doesn't allow me to continue this amazing game. :[ When I kill the helicopter with the rocket launcher (in that cliff level) the game completely crashes. Any idea what I can do about this? using dual e6600 at 3ghz ATI 6670 1gb 3 gb ram Many thanks in advance! :slight_smile: attached mdmp file as instructed hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_6T21_28_15C0.mdmp (76.5 KB)

item.title: Cliff helicopter fight crashes my game completely
item.dc:creator: PsychoBaBas
item.description:
Just a quick update.

I managed to stop the crash from happening by going to taskbar and setting hl2.exe priority to “high” instead of “normal”. No idea if that was a coincidence or I was just lucky. Hopefully somebody would know.
